Fifa should pay reparations of at least $440m (£356m) to migrant workers whose human rights have been compromised by the Qatar World Cup, a group of non-governmental organisations has said.

articles.author: Daniel Matthews
articles.title: Chelsea: Thomas Tuchel confirms Barcelona-bound Andreas Christensen has pulled out of MULTIPLE games - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Dane, 26, who will join Barcelona this summer, took himself out of contention for the defeat by Liverpool hours before kick-off. Tuchel refused to reveal the defender's exact reasons.
articles.content: Thomas Tuchel has confirmed that Saturdays FA Cup final was not the first time Andreas Christensen has withdrawn from the Chelsea squad at short notice, with the manager suggesting the defender might… [+1878 chars]
